CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7750SRa',"Please choose which power supplies you require.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7705SARWWx',"SAR-Wx Shelves supports AC power only. SAR-W Shelf supports AC and DC power options.",IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == '7750SRe',"No power calculations are performed in this tool. Please check how many supplies you need to achieve required levels of system redundancy. The e1 supports up to 4 supplies (2 are included), the e2 supports up to 8 (2 included) and the e3 supports up to 8 (3 included). AC and DC supplies can be mixed.","Power supply Information")))
CustomField.label: Power Supply information
